descriptionHTML:
Weather 14 days provides accurate and timely weather warnings and forecast for more than 20,000 locations in your country and 200,000 worldwide. It also provides information for ski stations.

Hourly detailed forecast for today and tomorrow, detailed forecast every 3 hours during the rest of the week as well as a prediction for the next week.
Very complete and easy application.

Multiple weather variables are available:
- Prediction symbol
- Maximum temperatures, daily minimum and hourly current temperature and wind chill.
- Wind speed and direction, including maximum gusts.
- Expected rain.
- Cloudiness
- Snow line.
- Relative humidity.
- etc.
It also provides additional relevant information as the sunrise/sunset and moon phase (including the moonrise/moonset and lighting rate)

You can also check our animated prediction maps that provide precipitations, temperature, pressure, snow, etc.. besides from multiple satellite images and rain radar.

And you can also view a nationwide map of weather risk alerts easily interpretable according to risk level.

In addition, you can add a weather widget to see your city forecast to five days directly on your device screen, with optional time and weather forecasting widget.

This application is fully optimized for both smartphones and tablets.

topReviews.reviewText: It only shows west and east I live in Tennessee and it will not show up o. The whole map at the precipitation part. PLEASE FIX
The best weather app I have ever had. Most accurate and reliable.
This is a great app! Easy to use and with just the right amount of useful information.  I love this app!
Awesome app I do love it, just wish it would show the temperature in my status bar!

it says 200,000 locations around the world could not find 1 in australia (crap) still a lot of crap I see you added new countries what about Australia????????????now in Australia which is very good Iam happy and give you7 stars
My settings keep going back, its kind of annoying, and on the map it won't let me see NY state? But basic temp work really good, its a good app if you don't want to use all the extras
Faultless and so easy to use. I love it.
Easy to use, light weight and lots of useful info.
Really, really impressed ... I've tried many other weather apps and this one delivers exactly what you need ... TREMENDOUS !!!
Informative. Useful and rather accurate
Even better would be without adds, but it seems light, and has many days detailed forecast.
Useful, doesn't use lots of data and very accurate not too much not too little information on the screen, just right. A must have!
Pretty accurate and detailed.
The possibility of automatically get GPS location does not exist.
It's not that good despite the temperatures are reading 2 or 3°C too high
app didn't find my city!!!
اصلا شهر های ایران رو نداره
Resets what i've set up everytime, Im going to delete this app.
Aparece a previsão de hora em hora!!
Always up to date.
can't show Rawalpindi weather
Dobra aplikacija   Ja izbrisav samo poradi raklamata sto trepka - strasno nervira!!!
To start my day as a business woman,  it is very helpful to be also prepared for the day's weather. Very helpful. ..!!!!!!
Really helpful and clear instructions
NICE AND MUCH CORRECT.
Not show Pakistan weather

New version works perfectly
It's too easy app to understand
Much better than others. Very accurate
Great weather application

whatsNewHTML:
What's New

-Now available for Australia!
-Added new countries: Netherlands, Austria, Bolivia, Panama, Uruguay
-Added new languages: Dutch, Polish, Swedish
